mapper.select: SELECT i.inn_uid, i.inn_name, i.inn_sep, i.inn_loc, r.room_last_cost FROM inn i, room r WHERE i.inn_uid = r.inn_uid and not r.room_last_cost IN (0) GROUP BY i.inn_uid;

SELECT i.inn_uid, i.inn_name, i.inn_sep, i.inn_loc, r.room_last_cost FROM inn i, room r WHERE i.inn_uid = r.inn_uid and not r.room_last_cost IN (0) and i.inn_loc like (#{inn_loc}) and i.inn_name like (#{inn_name}) GROUP BY i.inn_uid;

SELECT i.inn_name, i.inn_loc, i.inn_ment, i.inn_info, i.inn_sep, i.inn_pic, r.room_uid, r.room_name, r.room_info, r.room_pic, r.room_first_cost, r.room_last_cost FROM inn i, room r WHERE i.inn_uid = r.inn_uid and i.inn_uid = #{inn_uid};

SELECT re.review_uid, re.review_title, re.review_star, re.review_content, re.review_id, m.member_uid, b.book_member_name, m.member_pic FROM review re, book b, room r, inn i, member m WHERE re.book_uid = b.book_uid and b.member_uid = m.member_uid and b.room_uid = r.room_uid and r.inn_uid = i.inn_uid and i.inn_uid = #{inn_uid};
SELECT member_name, member_tel FROM member WHERE member_uid = #{member_uid};
SELECT i.inn_name, r.room_name, r.room_last_cost, r.room_uid, i.inn_sep FROM inn i, room r WHERE i.inn_uid = r.inn_uid and r.room_uid = #{room_uid};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(book_date, book_cost, book_name, book_member_name, book_member_tel, member_uid, room_uid) VALUES (now(), #{dto.book_cost}, #{dto.book_name}, #{dto.book_member_name}, #{dto.book_member_tel}, #{member_uid}, #{dto.room_uid});
mapper.select: SELECT b.book_uid FROM book b, member m, room r, inn i WHERE b.member_uid = #{member_uid} and b.room_uid = r.room_uid and r.inn_uid = i.inn_uid ORDER BY b.book_uid desc LIMIT 1;
